page.title: 08PLAYGR GAMES CHALFONTSTGILES
page.content: {First School Games} {Games based on TV/Films} Street Hawk,Wonder Woman,We are the Champions,This is your Life,Star Wars. {Chasing games} British Bulldog,Hide and Seek,It,Kiss Chase,Pom Pom,Knicker Chase,Cops and Robbers. {Imaginative Play} Mummies Daddies Babies, Dragons, War. {Rhyming games} In & out the dusty bluebells,Orange balls,Oranges and lemons,Ring a roses. {Activities} Running on field,Running on bench, Horses,Climbing. {Games using playground equipment} Climbing frame,tree trunks,concrete humps.
